events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I would like to return it and get a refund please.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request due to incorrect sizing and customer wants their money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from support. I’m here to assist you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 56789AB. The jacket is still new, I haven’t worn it and it’s in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned jacket. We will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for your help, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label offer.
We have sent you the return shipping label via email. Please send back the jacket at your earliest convenience and we will process your refund promptly.
Just checking in to see if you have shipped the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I dropped the package off yesterday. Thank you again for your great help throughout the process.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further support in the future. Have a great day!
A brief survey to rate your satisfaction with the refund process has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback!
